title: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure
description: This course introduces important concepts and terminology for working with Google Cloud Platform (GCP). It provides an overview of GCP's core services, including computing, storage, and networking, as well as key resource and policy management tools.

title: Cloud Engineering with Google Cloud
description: This professional certificate program provides hands-on training in the fundamental concepts and skills necessary to become a cloud engineer using Google Cloud Platform (GCP).

title: Google Cloud Platform Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: This course introduces the Big Data and Machine Learning capabilities of Google Cloud Platform (GCP). It provides a hands-on introduction to the processing capabilities of BigQuery and the ML capabilities of TensorFlow.
